segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you say so ? Everyone admires that you have a good wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . When we were poor , we often tried our best to make ends meet . It was a hard time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And we have some squabbles on some boring things .
segments.speaker: S1
